item.description:
This special event will be by invitation only to all of those who have donated to our fund in support of the Meetup website from August 2012 through the date of the event.  We'll lunch at Ruby's Brick Oven then go from there to enjoy the Yarn Seller.  For those members who attend, the owner of the shop is offering a 10% discount! If you are a donor you will receive your invitation this week.  If you're not yet, remember you can donate up to the date of the event to be eligible to attend.

 

We'll plan on carpooling from Starbucks in Dover.  I will be able to take up to 3 people in my car.  Is anyone else able to drive if need be?   If it's closer for you, you can meet us at Ruby's at around noon.

 

Hope to see you there, and thanks everyone of your support of the group!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll car pool/car train from the Starbucks parking lot at 11.
item.name: Ruby's Lunch/The Yarn Sellar
